ISSUE.TITLE: Small widths cause the sparkline to be overlapped by the launch button on dashboard
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Bug Report ##### SUMMARY Using narrower and narrower widths cause the launch button on the dashboard to start to overlap the sparkline, which looks odd and prevents you from clicking the sparkline. Simply put, this happens: ![Screenshot from 2019-08-22 14-32-46](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19942822/63540478-242f9400-c4ea-11e9-9116-5a1491010fe3.png) ##### ENVIRONMENT * AWX version: latest on chrome ##### STEPS TO REPRODUCE Launch some jobs to get a sparkline. narrow the screen to half-width on something like a laptop or some smaller width. ##### EXPECTED RESULTS The launch button avoids the sparkline. ##### ACTUAL RESULTS The launch button overlaps the sparkline.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4573 from ryanpetrello/backport-rrule-bugfix-373 fix an rrule bug that causes improper HOURLY/MINUTELY calculation

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #4568 from ryanpetrello/callback-status backport awx-manage run_callback_receiver --status
